entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon then southwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
